r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $875.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Effigis Geo Solutions. The average
  contract duration was 0.62 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $108.1K. The longest
  contract was 5.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $459.4K.
lookup_name: 'EFFIGIS GEO SOLUTIONS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '875.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '30'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '7%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-19%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-16.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.62'
s421_mean_contract_value: '108.1K'
s425_max_duration: '5.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '459.4K'
